author: kevaundray
content:
As noted on the call, pinging this channel to ask for us to add some Teku nodes that are running our rust implementation for the cryptography. 

<@425907307621122049> added the option to enable this on the cli with the `--Xrust-kzg-enabled` flag

PR for reference: https://github.com/Nashatyrev/teku/pull/62

author: barnabasbusa
content: does it make any sense to default to this going forward on all teku nodes?

author: barnabasbusa
content: or would you prefer 1/2-1/2?

author: barnabasbusa
content: Also does it make sense to do this on devnet 1 ?
